about_the_game:
COMBAT

  • Combine melee/ranged attacks and movement skills together freely
  • Switch weapons on the fly to seamlessly string together combos
  • Launch enemies into the sky or wall splat for extended juggles
  • Dash, blink, and fling through the air with momentum

FEATURES

  • Diverse weapon movesets and mechanics with unique playstyles
  • Varied enemies with distinct behavior
  • Layered soundtrack that gradually builds up with progression
  • Unlockable equipment and music
detailed_description:
COMBAT

  • Combine melee/ranged attacks and movement skills together freely
  • Switch weapons on the fly to seamlessly string together combos
  • Launch enemies into the sky or wall splat for extended juggles
  • Dash, blink, and fling through the air with momentum

FEATURES

  • Diverse weapon movesets and mechanics with unique playstyles
  • Varied enemies with distinct behavior
  • Layered soundtrack that gradually builds up with progression
  • Unlockable equipment and music

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 19.10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 21.04
  • Processor: Intel Celeron J Series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 400
  • Storage: 650 MB available space

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo

  • Storage: 650 MB available space
